wikipedia_page.main: Mary Lemon Waller (born Mary Lemon Fowler) (1851–1931) was a British portrait painter, who specialised in child portraits.

response: * Mary Lemon Waller, British portrait painter
* A portrait of Armstrong as a young boy by Mary Lemon Waller
* (Elizabeth) Moyra Goff (1897–1990), who never married, travelled to America, and lived at The Courts until her death in 1990; she was the subject of a 1902 portrait by Mary Lemon Waller.
